bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Petroleum and Chemical Industry--Premium Efficiency Severe Duty Totally Enclosed Fan-Cooled (TEFC) Squirrel Cage Induction Motors--Up to and Including 370 Kw (500 hp)
IEEE Draft Standard for Petroleum and Chemical Industry--Premium Efficiency Severe Duty Totally Enclosed Fan-Cooled (TEFC) Squirrel Cage Induction Motors--Up to and Including 370 Kw (500 hp)
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P841/D4, Jul 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard applies to premium efficiency totally enclosed fan-cooled (TEFC), horizontal and vertical, single-speed, squirrel cage polyphase induction motors, up to and including 370 kW (500 hp), and 4000 volts in National Electrical Manufacturers Association (NEMA) frame sizes 143T and larger, for petroleum, chemical, and other severe duty applications (commonly referred to as premium efficiency severe duty motors). Excluded from the scope of this standard are motors with sleeve bearings and additional specific features required for explosion-proof motors.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
